app.name: EngiSuite Analytics Pro
app.tagline: Unified SaaS platform for engineering calculations and data analysis
pageDescription: Unified SaaS platform for engineering calculations and data analysis
heroTitle: The Integrated Engineering Platform for All Your Needs
heroDescription: 50 advanced engineering calculation tools + professional data analysis with a high-level AI assistant, specially designed for engineers in Egypt
feature50CalculatorsDescription: Advanced electrical, mechanical, and civil calculations following international standards like IEC and ACI
featureDataAnalysisDescription: Analyze data from Excel/CSV/JSON files with a visual interface for query building and PDF reports
featureAIAssistantDescription: High-level AI assistant explains calculations, performs analysis, and generates reports in Arabic
featureProfessionalReportDescription: Professional report generator with high-quality designs and integration with engineering rules
featureCloudStorageDescription: Save and manage your statistics from anywhere using cloud storage
featureMobileCompatibleDescription: Responsive interface compatible with all devices
analyticsFileUploadDescription: Upload Excel, CSV, JSON files easily
analyticsDataManagementDescription: Efficiently manage and organize engineering data
analyticsPDFReportDescription: Generate professional reports in PDF format
aiLiveChatDescription: Ask anything you want with the AI Assistant
footerEngiSuiteDescription: The Integrated Engineering Platform for All Your Needs
footerCopyright: Â© 2024 EngiSuite Analytics Pro. All rights reserved.
